message: Let's start with a fair deal. I'll take 90%, you get 10%. Hope you agree!
Your offer was quite greedy, let's be more reasonable. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.
Let's compromise. I'll take 55% and you can have 45%. This is a fair split that considers the inflation and gives us both a good share.
Alice, let's stop wasting time.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit before inflation eats away at the value. Deal?
